answers.answer: You don't need much for baby. A car seat and appropriate clothes according to the weather. You can bring your own diapers and wipes but I think the hospital provides that.

I emailed the registration dept. at the hospital Im delivering at and they emailed me back with a list for myself & baby. I only packed mittens, an outfit for pictures and one for him to go home in. The hospital is providing everything else. And the carseat is ready for when we're released to go home.
I packed a hat and headband (I'm having a girl)  mittens, a pair of socks, an outfit to be taken home in, and a blanket. The hospital should provide diapers and whipes.

I packed clothes for me sanitary pads breast pads vests babygrow for bubba some milk bottles (in case i couldn breast feed) blankets nappys cottonbuds scratch mittens caméra carseat . They will have àll imp things at hosp so dw too much i prob went over board with packing lol

question: Can someone please tell me what I should pack for baby because I'm so nervous Dr might tell me he's gonna induce me soon. He's sending me for a stress test and have a horrible feeling it won't be good. I'm 34eeeks and yes I know all the down sides y'all or mainly every girl on here is gonna say. But the past history with my moms pregnancy and my difficulties during this pregnancy. High blood pressure diabetes depression and gallstones.Anyway I just need to know what to pack exactly
title: help
